title: Documentation
subtitle: Learn how to build structured AI APIs with ShapeShyft

steps.title: Create a Project
steps.description: Start by creating a new project in your dashboard. Give it a name and optional description.

steps.title: Add an LLM Key
steps.description: Configure your API key for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini, or a custom LLM server.

steps.title: Define an Endpoint
steps.description: Create an endpoint with input/output JSON schemas and connect it to your LLM key.

steps.title: Test Your Endpoint
steps.description: Use the built-in tester to send requests and validate responses.

steps.title: Integrate
steps.description: Call your endpoint from your application using simple GET or POST requests.

types.name: structured_in_structured_out
types.description: JSON input → LLM processing → JSON output

types.name: text_in_structured_out
types.description: Text input → LLM processing → JSON output

schemas.title: JSON Schemas
schemas.description: Define the structure of your inputs and outputs using JSON Schema. ShapeShyft validates all data against your schemas.

context.title: System Context
context.description: Provide system prompts to guide the LLM's behavior. This context is included with every request to your endpoint.
